text:
My oldest has difficult relationship w/ me ~
2014 when I began treating #Cancer w/ #Cannabis she decided I was "crazy"
I am still here 2021 it is hard to have family split ~ 
I truly believe we eat 550 nutrients in the Plant and God heals us of Cannabinoid Deficiency Disease https://t.co/grMiY5BlMD https://t.co/fD3jKoLo5f
